content: Fix cookiejar.test.js - Change response.body to response.data and add missing await
Fix multipleImports.test.ts - Fix multiple connection issues
Fix multipartFormData.test.ts - Debug first test timeout
Fix integration.test.ts - Handle HTML vs JSON responses properly
Fix images.test.ts - Replace response.stream with response.arrayBuffer()
Make request IDs globally unique across instances
Fix shared global variables (child, lastRequestID, isShuttingDown)
Create InstanceManager class for tracking instances by port
Create SharedInstance class for managing Go server and clients
Refactor initCycleTLS to use shared instance manager
Test multiple connection fix with debug test
Test that existing functionality still works with new architecture
